text: Ke timi aphno guptavartabhanda pahila dana dinubata tarsihalyau? Ani jaba timile yasto garenau ra allahale timila'i ksama garidiyo ta namaja padhne gara ra jakata (dharmadaya) dindai gara ra allaha ra usako rasulako ajnapalana garnegara. Ra jeâ€“jati timile gardachau, allahala'i tyo sabai thaha cha
